data.name: [RESX:Actions:DeleteConfirm].Text
data.value: Are you sure you wish to delete this item?

data.name: [RESX:Tips:Active].Text
data.value: Check this box box to easily turn a forum on or off.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:EmailAddress].Text
data.value: Enter the email that will be used as the From email address when sending notifications.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:ForumDesc].Text
data.value: Enter a brief description of the forum.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:ForumGroup].Text
data.value: Select the parent Group for this forum or select a forum to create a sub forum

data.name: [RESX:Tips:ForumName].Text
data.value: Enter the name for this forum.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:Hidden].Text
data.value: Check this box to hide this forum from the list of forums for users that do not have access.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:QuickReplyForm].Text
data.value: Select the template for displaying the quick reply form.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:ReplyForm].Text
data.value: Select the template for the form users will use when creating a reply.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:TopicForm].Text
data.value: Select the template for the form users will use when creating a new topic.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:TopicsTemplate].Text
data.value: Select the template for displaying the list of topics

data.name: [RESX:Tips:TopicTemplate].Text
data.value: Select the template for displaying the topic and replies

data.name: [RESX:Actions:RequiredFields].Text
data.value: Please enter values for the required fields

data.name: [RESX:Tips:CacheStore].Text
data.value: Choose the location where you would like cached items to be stored.

data.name: [RESX:DeleteAction:Intro].Text
data.value: Choose what happens to content when deleted. Remove - Removes content from database. Recycle - Content is marked as deleted and remains in the database.

data.name: [RESX:FloodControl:Intro].Text
data.value: Number of seconds a user must wait between posts.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:ForumTemplate].Text
data.value: Select the template for the page that will display all your forums.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:ForumTheme].Text
data.value: Select the graphic theme for your forum.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:LoggingLevel].Text
data.value:
Choose the level of logging for your forums.
Disabled - No activities are logged
Moderate - Move and Delete are logged.
Full - All activities are logged.

data.name: [RESX:MailQueue:Intro].Text
data.value: Recommended for sites with large numbers of subscribers. Requires DotNetNuke scheduler. See documentation for more details.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:Moderated].Text
data.value: Enable this feature if you would like to approve topics and replies before they appear in the forum.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:PageSize].Text
data.value: Enter the default number of items you would like to appear on the topics and replies page.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:ServerTimeZone].Text
data.value: The time zone offset allows you to adjust the time calculations as necessary. In most situations you will leave this set to 0.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:UserProfileTemplate].Text
data.value: Select the template for displaying the author information for a topic or reply.

data.name: [RESX:Actions:MinMax].Text
data.value: Minimum Points must be less than Maximum Points

data.name: [RESX:Actions:RestoreConfirm].Text
data.value: Are you sure you wish to delete all current filters and load the default filter set?

data.name: [RESX:Tips:InheritGroup].Text
data.value: Check this box to inherit security and features from the group.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:EnableAvatars].Text
data.value: Choose whether or not to enable avatars and the appropriate options.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:EnablePoints].Text
data.value: Enable or disable the points systems and set appropriate point values.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:EnableProfiles].Text
data.value:
Select how you would like profiles to be displayed
Basic - the default Active Forums profile
Advanced - Displays profile from Active Profile, if installed.
Disabled - profiles will be disabled.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:MemberListMode].Text
data.value: Choose who should be able to access the member list.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:Signatures].Text
data.value: Choose if signatures should be enabled and how they are displayed.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:Subscriptions].Text
data.value: Choose whether or not users can subscribe to forums and what types of subscriptions are allowed.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:UserDisplayMode].Text
data.value: Choose how you would like to have the member\'s name to appear.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:PMTabId].Text
data.value: Select the page where you have the private messaging module installed.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:AdminNotify].Text
data.value: This is an optional template that will be sent to moderators of this forum when a topic or reply is created by email. This template will only be used when the message is not moderated.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:AllowHTML].Text
data.value: Allow users to create posts using HTML tags. Click the properties icon for more details.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:Attachments].Text
data.value: Allow users to upload attachments with their posts. Click the properties icon for more details.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:AutoCreateUsers].Text
data.value: Enable this option to have new users created automatically when the user account cannot be found based upon their email address.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:AutoRepsonse].Text
data.value: This is an optional template that can be sent to the user to let them know that their email was received.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:AutoSubscribe].Text
data.value: Select roles which will be automatically subscribed and receive email notifications for new content posted to this forum.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:EMORequired].Text
data.value: Enable this option to reject messages that do not include the End of Message tag specified above.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:Emoticons].Text
data.value: Allow users to add emoticons (smileys) to their posts.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:EOMTag].Text
data.value: The End of Message (EOM) tag is a method for only including new information when a user replies by email. The user should add this tag after their message and before text of the previous message.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:Filters].Text
data.value: Use filters to replace text from a users post when it is submitted.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:IndexContent].Text
data.value: Allows content from this forum to be included in the DotNetNuke site search. This may give users access to secure content.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:MailConnector].Text
data.value: Allows users to reply to posts via email. Click the properties icon for more details.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:ModType].Text
data.value: Allows you to override the default moderation settings for the forum.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:POP3Address].Text
data.value: Specific email address for this forum. This will override the site email address and the email address that may have been entered under the forum settings.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:POPMailServer].Text
data.value: Enter the domain or ip address for your POP3 server. i.e. mail.mycompany.com

data.name: [RESX:Tips:POPPassword].Text
data.value: Enter the Password for the account specified above.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:POPUserName].Text
data.value: Enter the username that will be used to connect to the POP3 mail server.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:PostIcon].Text
data.value: Allow user to select from the list of icons to help identify their post.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:RejectNotify].Text
data.value: This template will be sent to the user when their email message is rejected.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:RestrictByAlias].Text
data.value: Enable this option to only import messages that have been sent directly to the email address specified above. Disable this feature if you wish to import all messages that are in the mailbox for this account.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:RSS].Text
data.value: Allow users to subscribe to this forum with RSS. Only security roles with Read access can subscribe.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:Scripts].Text
data.value: Allow users to insert javascript with their posts. Not recommended.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:SiteURL].Text
data.value: This should be the default website address for your portal.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:StripHTML].Text
data.value: Select this option to remove HTML from email messages.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:SubNotify].Text
data.value: This allows you to select a template other than the default email subscription template to be sent to users using email.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:Tags].Text
data.value: Allow authors to enter tags when creating posts.

data.name: [RESX:EditControl:Intro].Text
data.value: Allows the user to only edit their post within a given number of minutes from the time it was created. User must also have edit permission. Set this value to 0 to disable this feature.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:AnswerPointValue].Text
data.value: Points to award a member for providing the answer to a topic.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:MarkAnswerPointValue].Text
data.value: Points to award the author of topic when they select an answer.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:ModPointValue].Text
data.value: Points to award a moderator for moderating a post.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:ReplyPointValue].Text
data.value: Points to award a member for creating a new reply.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:TopicPointValue].Text
data.value: Points to award a member for creating a new topic.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:AvatarDimensions].Text
data.value: Choose the maximum height and width for avatars

data.name: [RESX:Tips:EnableAvatarLinks].Text
data.value: Allow your users to link to avatars that are hosted on another server.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:SubscriptionOptions].Text
data.value: Select which subscription methods will be available to your users.

data.name: [RESX:AddThis:Intro].Text
data.value: Easily add social bookmarking capabilities to your site. Visit www.addthis.com to create an account then enter the account name in the textbox.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:AddRoles].Text
data.value: Select the Role you would like to add to the security grid and then click the plus icon.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:AddUser].Text
data.value: Enter the Username of the person you would like to add to the security grid and then click the plus icon.

data.name: [RESX:UserNameNotFound].Text
data.value: The username you entered was not found.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:AvatarDefault].Text
data.value: Enable this option to display the default avatar from the themes directory when a user has not yet specified an avatar.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:UsersOnlineEnabled].Text
data.value: Enable this feature to indicate when user is online and visiting the forums.

data.name: [RESX:MaintenanceInstruct].Text
data.value: Specify criteria below to remove content from your forums. Click the "Test Run" button to receive count of the number topics that will be affected. Click the "Execute" button to begin maintenance. This process may take several minutes to complete. Please wait for the process to complete before closing leaving this page.

data.name: [RESX:MaintenanceWarning].Text
data.value:
Make sure you have created a back-up of your database before proceeding. Topics will be deleted based upon the removal method you have specified on the main settings tab.

Your removal method is currently set to {0}. Your topics will be {1} based upon the criteria you specify below.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:MaintActivityOlderThan].Text
data.value: Enter the number of days. This will apply to topics that haven\'t had a reply within the number of days you have specified.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:MaintOlderThan].Text
data.value: Enter the number of days. This will apply to topics that are older than the number of days you have specified.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:MaintTopicsByUser].Text
data.value: Enter the user id. This will restrict the process to only topics that were created by the specified user id.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:MaintWithOutReplies].Text
data.value: Enable this option to simply remove all topics that have never had a reply.

data.name: [RESX:Maint:RequiredCriteria].Text
data.value: Please check your selected criteria and try again.

data.name: [RESX:Warning:Maint].Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to run this process?

data.name: [RESX:Actions:FinalConfirm].Text
data.value: Just to make sure, do you really want to delete this item and all related data?

data.name: [RESX:Actions:ForumDeleteConfirm].Text
data.value: WARNING! - Deleting this item will permanently delete all related content. Do not continue unless you have a back up.\n Click OK to delete all related content. Click Cancel to exit.

data.name: [RESX:Actions:GroupDeleted].Text
data.value: The group and all related content has been deleted.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:EnableShortUrls].Text
data.value: Enable this feature and Active Forums will only include the minimum parameters needed.

data.name: [RESX:Captcha:Intro].Text
data.value: Enable this feature to require anonymous users to enter a random security code to help prevent spam content.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:UseSkinBreadcrumb].Text
data.value: Enable this feature and Active Forums will update the breadcrumb navigation element within your skin. This is only supported with the DotNetNuke Breadcrumb skin object.

data.name: [RESX:AutoLink:Intro].Text
data.value: Enable this option for Active Forums to convert website addresses automatically into hyperlinks.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:TopicPriority].Text
data.value: Topic Priority allows topics to appear higher in the list rather than sorted by date. The default priority for all topics is 0. The higher the priority the higher a topic will appear in the list.

data.name: [RESX:ActiveSocialTip].Text
data.value: Enter the keys you created in the Active Social Control panel under the Access Control section of the Journal.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:VanityName].Text
data.value: Enter the name you would like to be used within the url when accessing this forum.

data.name: [RESX:WARN:DeleteProperty].Text
data.value: Are you sure you wish to delete this property?

data.name: [RESX:CommunityOptions:Intro].Text
data.value: The settings below allow you to control the community features within your forums.

data.name: [RESX:DesignAndTemplates:Intro].Text
data.value: The settings below will help you adjust forum appearance.

data.name: [RESX:EnterpriseFeatures:Intro].Text
data.value: Features that might be necessary for high traffic sites.

data.name: [RESX:FullTextSearch:Intro].Text
data.value: Full-Text Search provides better performance and more accurate results.

data.name: [RESX:MainFeatures:Intro].Text
data.value: The features below are used across all forums. You can enable or disable certain features below.

data.name: [RESX:Members:Intro].Text
data.value: The settings below will allow you to control how members interact within your forums.

data.name: [RESX:PostingOptions:Intro].Text
data.value: The settings below allow you to control various aspects of content creation within your forums.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:ActiveSocial].Text
data.value: Active Forums will send updates to the Active Social Journal.

data.name: [RESX:Confirm:URLToggle].Text
data.value: Caution: Installing or Uninstalling the Active Forums URL Handler will require a change to your web.config. \n\nAre you sure you want to make this change right now?

data.name: [RESX:Tips:CreatePostCount].Text
data.value: The minimum number of posts a user must have in order to create a new topic.

data.name: [RESX:Tips:ReplyPostCount].Text
data.value: The minumum number of posts a user must have in order to reply to a topic.
